MANAGER, INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
FULL-TIME
REPORTS TO: DIRECTOR OF INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY



THE LEARNING OPPORTUNITY:

To proactively support the achievement of the strategic objectives of The Body Shop through the evaluation, development, implementation and management of key applications and services.


Closing Date: May 9, 2003
Starting Date: June 19, 2003


What Would You Do?

Key Accountabilities:

 Strategic systems planning
 Network and telephone operational support
 Database development
 Security
 Disaster recovery

Core Competencies:

 Strong technical skills, with hands-on project management and leadership ability
 Strong assessment skills
 Strong analytical skills

ARE YOU WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR?

Required Knowledge, Skills and Experience

 8-10 years of experience in network, security, telecomm and database management
 A degree in a related field from an accredited university or equivalent combination of education and professional experience
 Excellent communication skills (verbal and written)
 Proven leadership abilities
 Ability to prioritize, organize and multi-task
 Ability to self-manage and be proactive
 Trouble shooting and problem solving skills

How to Apply:

E-mail your cover letter and resume to IT@thebodyshop.ca

We thank all applicants, however, only those under consideration will be contacted.

Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
Ref Code: ITM-0603  

Contact Information
The Body Shop Canada
